glossentry.glossdef:
The Software Distribution Annex summarizes all information necessary to present the terms of use and to fulfill the obligations in providing or transferring the Software Distribution. The Annex includes the following elements:
The associated and effective licenses and notices of each included component.
The source code of the components if specified for the software distribution in accordance with the effective license.
A documentation of all third-party components (Bill of Materials) with supplemental license information and notices.
Depending on the use case and contractual framework conditions, further aspects may be included in the Software Distribution Annex. These include notes on import and export, the assessment of vulnerabilities of the software components or supplementary patent information.
